definitions.definition: A feeling of discomfort or vexation caused by what one dislikes.
That which causes such a feeling.
To disturb or irritate, especially by continued or repeated acts; to bother with unpleasant deeds.
definitions.example: Marc loved his sister, but when she annoyed him he wanted to switch her off.

definitions.definition: To do something to upset or anger someone; to be troublesome.
To molest; to harm; to injure.
definitions.example: to annoy an army by impeding its march, or by a cannonade
